Orton is obviously a legend. He's had one of the greatest careers in professional wrestling, and has a laundry list of accomplishments. But I really think that this run with Riddle, where he's legitimately just having the time of his life, is solidifying him as one of the all time greats. The man is just out there every week, being an incredible wrestler. He's damn good at what he does, and he's having so much fun right now that his energy is just infectious. Hard not to love Randy Orton right now.
